title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 606.4 - Hitchhiking; loitering
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 606.4 - Hitchhiking; loitering

State Regulations

No person shall hitchhike in or upon the vehicular crossing
nor shall any person or persons congregate, stand, sit or loiter in or upon the
buildings or areas of the authority after a request by a bridge employee to
disperse. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

606.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
